summary: An ordinance fixing the rate of taxes to be levied and levying the taxes upon all taxable property, both real and personal, in the City of Seattle, needed to raise sufficient revenue to carry on the different departments of the municipal government of the City of Seattle, for the ensuing fiscal year, to-wit: for the year beginning on the first day of January 1918, and ending on the thirty-first day of December 1918, including the interest to accrue during said year on the bonded debt and the redemption of bonds falling due during said fiscal year.
